teams.name: Netherlands

teams.description: FairSpirit microkrediet promoot Kiva in Nederland. Doe jij ook mee met het FairSpirit team?

teams.name: Trolltech Foundation
teams.loan_because: we believe that empowering people to help themselves is the path to true and lasting prosperity.
teams.description:
The Trolltech Foundation was founded by the first 8 founders and employees of the company Trolltech. We transferred company shares to the foundation with the philosophy that we should not forget the world around us if we had success. We achieved great success and when the company was sold to Nokia the foundation sold its shares.

We are a non-profit charitable foundation and aim to help people in developing countries. We think Kiva is a great way to achieve this.

teams.name: The Hartman Family
teams.description: We are starting a Christmas tradition of giving microloans together

teams.name: Kiva Capitalists
teams.loan_because: Capital and business make the world go round; trade is a stabilizing force. Offering non-usurious loans to help people start businesses to provide others with goods and services they need or want is what capitalism is all about. We are all proud capitalists, and some of us are even unrepentant.
teams.description: Free markets, free minds. Hayek, Mises, Friedman.

teams.name: Crazy Canucks
teams.loan_because: We live in a well-to-do nation and want to help those less fortunate than ourselves

teams.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks
teams.loan_because:
Fairbanks is the Golden Heart City of Alaska, together we can make a difference in the world.

This group was created by 6 dedicated Honors students in Sherri Wall's Honor's Econ Class with the hopes of seeing how far the funds raised at a two day bakesale could go, their 150 dollars will never be withdrawn from Kiva and who knows where it will end up? 

In the spirit of giving and the with the heart of a Nanook please consider how far your 25 dollars can go. 

Update: $25 has gone quite far! Nearly 1,000 loans have been made as of this update. Nanooks are making a HUGE difference in the world. The golden heart of Fairbanks has consistently put us in the top 3 contributing University/College communities!
teams.description: UAF is America's Arctic University with students, staff and alumni from all over the world. UAF is a family of artists, whether in research or liberal arts, Nanooks are changing the world.

teams.name: Poland
teams.description: We live in Poland or have our roots in this country.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Catholic Kiva
teams.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
teams.description: Anyone is welcome to join our group.  The team is just for fun and to help build community.
